snippet.title: Krog Wars
snippet.description: A new action game that can be played in 2D mode or 3D mode. A bounty hunter out for krog credits, it's your mission to destroy everything the universe has to throw at you. Complete bonus rounds to rack up tons of krog credits and use them to purchase ship upgrades and special attacks. Use your upgrades and missile attacks to defeat crazy boss encounters and see how far you can make it. Enjoy varying play styles, endless missions, and awesome upgrades.
